A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What ashame\, complete garbage compared to the originals.
Quality speaks for itself\, the directors should be embarrassed . The argument of creative difference is a complete justification for lack of vision and overall incompetence. The movie is filled with moral relativism\, where wrong and right are comingled in a twisted portrayal.

Sad\, just sad. I wished they would have never sold the rights.
